    6. 2306.14767 Distorted triangular skyrmion lattice in a noncentrosymmetric tetragonal magnet (skyrmion, arXiv)

    12. 2306.13927 Observation of first-order quantum phase transitions and ferromagnetism in twisted double bilayer graphene (graphene FM, arXiv)

    14. 2306.14181 GiftBTE: An efficient deterministic solver for non-gray phonon Boltzmann transport equation (arXiv)

    16. 2306.14501 Atomic-Scale Tailoring of Chemisorbed Atomic Oxygen on Epitaxial Graphene for Graphene-Based Electronic Devices (HWYeom, arXiv)

    20. 103 Artificial Atoms Go Chiral (Physics)

    23. 2306.13291 Multi-locational Majorana Zero Modes (arXiv)

    24. 2306.13235 Planckian dissipation and $c$-axis superfluid density in cuprate superconductors (Sudip, arXiv)
